import './foodItem.css' const FoodItem = (props) => { const { foodItem } = props const { userId } = sessionStorage var count; const addItem = () => { count = count + 1 console.log sessionStorage['count'] = count } // console.log(foodItem.name) return (
{foodItem.name} Price: ${foodItem.price}
{foodItem.description}
) } export default FoodItem
